long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhancing Web Application Quality Assurance with Steward.
Steward is a simple Quality Assurance (QA) visual issue reporting, and tracking tools that solves all your Quality Assurance and Issue reporting, and tracking problems.

How does it works:
Steward Visual Issue Reporting Tool, seamlessly integrated with Jira, enhances collaboration and issue resolution in software development.
It empowers teams to report, track, and manage visual issues efficiently, ensuring smoother project workflows and improved software quality.

Reporting issues using the "Steward Chrome extension"
Reporting issues using the Steward Chrome extension to Jira simplifies the process, enabling users to capture web page screenshots and record screen, add detailed descriptions, and instantly create Jira issues.

This streamlined approach enhances communication and expedites issue resolution within development teams.
Its smart features make it a powerful stand-alone visual issue reporting tool.

Screen Recording:
Steward simplifies the quality assurance process by allowing testers to record the screen and report any issues or bugs they encounter during testing, enhancing collaboration and troubleshooting efforts.

Screenshot Capturing:
Steward allow QA testers to capture screenshots of web application issues and log them to popular project management tools e.g. JIRA. This visual documentation provides developers with a clear understanding of the problem, reducing miscommunication and accelerating the resolution process.

Integration with Bug tracking systems:
Steward integrate seamlessly with popular bug tracking systems, streamlining the QA workflow and ensuring that issues are tracked from discovery to resolution.

Enhanced Communication:
Steward bridge the communication gap between testers and developers by providing a visual context for issues, reducing misunderstandings, and accelerating issue resolution.

Efficiency and Improved Quality:
The streamlined workflow, and screenshot reporting features of Steward result in more efficient QA processes, reducing the time and effort required to address issues. By catching and addressing issues early in the development process, Steward contribute to higher-quality web applications, reducing the risk of post-launch problems and customer dissatisfaction.

Cost Savings:
Detecting and resolving issues early in development is more cost-effective than addressing them after a web application is live. Steward contribute to cost savings by minimizing post-launch bug fixes and maintenance.
